meanings.definition: A person who adopts driving techniques that maximize fuel efficiency.
meanings.sent1: The hypermiler always makes sure to drive smoothly to save gas.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a hypermiler and he never accelerates too quickly to save fuel.
meanings.sent3: The hypermiler decided to challenge themselves by seeing how far they could drive on just one tank of gas.
meanings.sent4: She was a hypermiler, gliding through traffic like a feather on the wind.
meanings.sent5: The hypermiler's dedication to fuel efficiency was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To drive a vehicle in a way that maximizes fuel efficiency.
meanings.sent1: I hypermile by coasting down hills to save on gas.
meanings.sent2: Drivers who hypermile often avoid sudden stops to conserve fuel.
meanings.sent3: He hypermilered his way to work, much to the amusement of his coworkers.
meanings.sent4: She hypermilered through the city streets, as if in a fuel-saving dance.
meanings.sent5: The way he hypermilered his old car to achieve incredible mileage was remarkable.
